exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d H : n \\in pts s : dynamic id H_find : find st (getLocal n d) = Some s The term "n" has type "Equality.sort nat_eqType" while it is expected to have type "TPCCoh ?d".

original: intros H_find. specialize (locCn n d C). move/andP: Puniq => [H_uniq1 _]. specialize (locCn H). move: locCn => [h [s' [l_eq _]]]. rewrite l_eq in H_find. inversion H_find as [H_eq]. rewrite -H_eq. auto.
